page.title: 15FRAMPTON VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Events were held in 1985 to raise funds for major improvements to the kitchen and toilets of the{Village {Hall.}A{car boot sale}was held on the playing field behind the Old Primary School. 21 car owners turned out their attics, paid Â£3 for a site and sold their wares. Over 500 people came. A{mini-circus}was organised by a local family using a big-top with diameter 13m and an inside height of 5m to the trapeze bar. Local talent provided clowns, jugglers, dancers, baton twirlers, and trapeze artists. 280 people can watch the show. The annual{Tennis Club dinner Dance} has members sharing out the preparation of a 3 course meal which is then assembled and served in the village hall.
